title: Data Deposition and License Agreement
text: Please read and accept the Data Deposition and License Agreement (DDLA) before proceeding with the submission of your dataset.
By accepting the DDLA, you agree to comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the agreement regarding the use, distribution, and licensing of your dataset.

title: Please provide basic information on the dataset
text: Fill in the title and description of your dataset. Make sure to provide a clear and concise description to help others understand the content and purpose of your dataset.
Select an appropriate license for your dataset to specify how others can use it.

title: Please describe your dataset
text: Here is the explanation how the AutocompleteWidget Field works.

title: Please provide information on the authors of the dataset
text: Add the names and affiliations of the authors who contributed to the dataset.
You need to specify at least one author with the creator role.

allowedRoles.label: Creator
allowedRoles.tooltip: The primary individual responsible for creating the dataset.

allowedRoles.label: Contributor
allowedRoles.tooltip: An individual who contributed to the dataset but is not the primary creator.

title: Please upload the files of the dataset
text: Upload the files that make up your dataset. You can add multiple files as needed.

title: Please review and submit your dataset
text: Review the information and files you have provided for your dataset.
If everything looks good, you can submit your dataset for deposition.
